Only heroes can save the world,salvation or destruction? All in your hands!

One thousand years ago when the haly war ends,the angel fallen into demon.
The demons premeditate launch a new war.
In order to control human, the demons built a castle in the world.
Demons slaughter all the rebels,human is faces unprecedented disaster, but love and faith will save the world.
Hero is bron for saving. The prince Cyprus, the ture hero on his way for salvation......
